item.title: How do i make a tellport, and a command teleport
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

thats the tele command?
i belive your looking for something like this

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("relleka")) {
        teleportToX = 2680;
        teleportToY = 3718;
	sendMessage("You teleport to the Rock crab training area");
    }

100 errors? make sure your brackets are lined up.

item.title: How do i make a tellport, and a command teleport
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

Make sure you put it in the right place.
Also, when you say tele, do you mean, say, if someone types in “::varrock”, it will take them to varrock?
Because if so, the tele code above isn’t the right one, that’s for people to tele anywhere within the RS map using the designated Co-ords.

Btw, when you say “a teleport that leads somewhere and back”, do you mean an actual portal? Or just the command?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a tellport, and a command teleport
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

		if (command.startsWith("tele")) {
				try {
					int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,9));
					int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10,14));
					teleportToX = newPosX;
					teleportToY = newPosY;
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::tele ####,####");
				}
}

If this is what you ment?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2009, 11:46:59 pm[/size][hr]And this is a command for teleing another player to jail.

if (command.startsWith("gotojail") && (c.playerRights >= 1)) {
				try {
				int jailtype = misc.random(4);
					String otherPName = command.substring(5);
					int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

					if (otherPIndex != -1) {
						client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
					if(jailtype == 1){
						p.teleportToX = 3014;
						p.teleportToY = 3195;
						}
						if(jailtype == 2){
						p.teleportToX = 3014;
						p.teleportToY = 3192;
						}
						if(jailtype == 3){
						p.teleportToX = 3014;
						p.teleportToY = 3189;
						}
						if(jailtype == 4){
						p.teleportToX = 3018;
						p.teleportToY = 3189;
						}
						p.heightLevel = 0;
						p.updateRequired = true;
						p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
						p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to jail by"
								+ c.playerName);
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("The name doesnt exist.");
					}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					c.sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");
				}
			}

I hope this is what you were looking for lol?

Read full topic
